text.name: DFP_ResetNPCs_Tooltip
text.text: NPC greediness and economic situation will be rerolled at midnight. This setting automatically returns to off after.

text.name: DFP_ShowPriceModifier_Tooltip
text.text: When buying or selling fields show the current price modifier amount

text.name: DFP_MaxGreed_Tooltip
text.text: Maximum price factor for an NPCs greediness value. Changes will immediately adjust prices. Default: 1.2 (+20%)

text.name: DFP_MinGreed_Tooltip
text.text: Minimum price factor for an NPCs greediness value. Changes will immediately adjust prices. Default: 0.8 (-20%)

text.name: DFP_MaxEco_Tooltip
text.text: Maximum price factor for an NPCs economic situation. Changes will immediately adjust prices. Default: 1.6 (+60%)

text.name: DFP_MinEco_Tooltip
text.text: Minimum price factor for an NPCs economic situation. Changes will immediately adjust prices. Default: 0.6 (-40%)

text.name: DFP_Discourage_Tooltip
text.text: Part of price that is added/substracted when a field is bought/sold. Meant to discourage field flipping. Changes will immediately adjust prices. Default: 0.1 (+10% / -10%)
